name: No Signal (itch) (Pedro Rainha)
description:
This game is a Ludum Dare 46 Jam Submission.

You play as a child who is trying to stay connected to free Wi-Fi from a van, try to follow it if you can! The Van has a red trail behind it, try to keep the connection alive!

Have fun!

https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/46/drunk-guy-wifi

Controls

WASD - Movement

Space -Jump

Shift - Sprint

Team

Pedro Rainha - programmer

Jake Turner - Programmer

Freddy Hodge - Artist/Programmer
